title: Mr. Squiggle
brief_description: Mr. Squiggle was Australia’s longest-running children’s television series, and the name of the title character from that ABC show. The show has been presented in many formats, from five minute slots to a one-and-a-half hour variety show featuring other performers, and has had several name changes, originally airing as Mr. Squiggle and Friends.
